sentences.english: This study suggests that the permeability of yeast cells can be increased by square-wave electroporation.
sentences.chinese: 这表明电穿孔法可以有效增强酵母菌细胞的通透性。

sentences.english: The best-known extracts are derived from specially selected strains of primary grown baker's yeast.
sentences.chinese: 最知名的酵母抽提物来自于专门选择的面包酵母菌。

sentences.english: Hybridization is also used for the improvement of yeast strains.
sentences.chinese: 杂交技术也被用于改良酵母菌株。

sentences.english: He and his colleagues found the genes in yeast.
sentences.chinese: 他和他的同事们是在酵母菌里找到这些东西的。

sentences.english: Research on vinegar fermentation technique with immobilized Saccharomyces cerevisiae Hansen and Acetobacter spp.
sentences.chinese: 固定化酵母菌和醋酸杆菌发酵食醋工艺研究。

sentences.english: Fresh lettuce and other salad greens, for example, are badly contaminated by yeasts and molds.
sentences.chinese: 比如，新鲜的生菜和沙拉，严重污染酵母菌和霉菌。

sentences.english: The therapy group was treated plus with saccharomyces boulardii viaora.
sentences.chinese: 治疗组在此基础上口服布拉酵母菌。

sentences.english: Persimmon fruit wine was produced by single yeast strain solid fermentation with sweet persimmon as raw materials.
sentences.chinese: 以甜柿为原料，采用酵母菌固态发酵法生产柿子果酒。

sentences.english: Studied the selecting method of agglutinating nature yeast on alcohol fermentation.
sentences.chinese: 研究了酒精发酵凝集性酵母菌的筛选方法。

sentences.english: Conclusion Treating acute diarrhea of children with S. boulardii sachets has good efficacy.
sentences.chinese: 结论布拉氏酵母菌治疗小儿急性腹泻疗效明显。

sentences.english: In fresh yeast production, it's the nitrogen source for yeast cultivation (Dosage is not specified. ).
sentences.chinese: 用作鲜酵母生产中酵母菌培养用氮源，用量不规定。

sentences.english: The company has been involved in re-engineering yeast to make artemisinin, the anti-malarial drug.
sentences.chinese: 该公司参与再造了酵母菌，以生产抗疟疾药青蒿素。

sentences.english: Nystain has been found to inhibit the growth of yeast like flora in the intestinal tract.
sentences.chinese: 已查明制霉菌素在肠道内可抑制菌丛类酵母菌的生长。

sentences.english: Otherwise, high concentrations of isobutanol would inhibit the growth of the yeast.
sentences.chinese: 否则，高浓度的异丁醇会抑制酵母菌的生长。

sentences.english: To make the thalli protein, the yeast were put into the sugar-free grains and the beer grains.
sentences.chinese: 以糖糟和啤酒糟为原料，接入酵母菌，生产蛋白饲料。
